content: this pattern comes with 9 different variations that can be turned into pretty much any lgbtq+ flag or any other colour combination you like there is also a solid colour version of the shell making the pattern very versatile my goal was to design a pattern that anyone could see themselves represented in this is a no-sew beginner to intermediate pattern that uses slip_stitch single_crochet increase and decrease it is also helpful to know invisible increase invisible decrease and invisible join which are described within the pattern it is written in us terminology
